entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
